author: DJimBo
title: nice little expansion set! ( 7,8 / 10 )
review:
This is just one of those nice old small sets. There are nice pieces and nice minifigs.

pros:
- Dolphin and parrot
- Radio
- Two minifigs

cons:
- No

Difficulty rank: 1/10
Buildingtime: 5 minutes
Building fun:    7/10
Structure:        7/10
Strength:         9/10
Playability:       7/10
Pricing:            9/10
Overall:           7,8/10

It's just a nice set. nice pieces nicely priced. If you can get your hands on one, buy it than!
